member.summary: Override price group context.
member.remarks: Specifying changeBasketBillingCurrency to true will recalculate both VAT, VATRate and price for the individual lines. member.remarks: If a price is not defined in the price group the order line will be removed.

member.name: T:UCommerce.EntitiesV2.Product
member.summary: A class which represents the uCommerce_Product table in the UCommerce Database.

member.name: T:UCommerce.EntitiesV2.AmountOffOrderTotalAward
member.summary: A class which represents the uCommerce_AmountOffOrderTotalAward table in the UCommerce Database.
Adds a order level discount with a fixed amount.
member.remarks: Order level discounts are expected to be attached to the order only, but differentiated VAT rates makes this impossible as we need the line prices with accompanying VAT rate to correctly calculate VAT for an item. Will check whether we're dealing with differentiated VAT. If we are then attaches the discount to all items. Pipeline will spread the discount across lines according to their relative value.

member.name: T:UCommerce.Search.RavenDB.RavenFacetProvider
member.summary: Handles faceted aspects of a RavenDB based query.
member.remarks: RavenDB doesn't support returning empty facet values. This implementation works around that by query individually for each facet available as if it were the initial facet in the query. This enables us to keep facets, which would otherwise be filtered from the facet results.

member.name: T:UCommerce.Search.IFacetProvider
member.summary: Responsible for getting facets for a given query and combining a given set of facets with a query to produce to final filtered result based on provided facets.

member.summary: Gets facets for a specific query.

member.name: M:UCommerce.Search.RavenDB.RavenFacetProvider.CombineQueryAndFacets``1(UCommerce.Search.IFacetedQueryable,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{UCommerce.Search.Facets.Facet})
member.summary: Creates a new queryable with facets and raw query combined ready to be executed for getting the search results.
member.remarks: Query and facets are kept separate to be able to display the full range of available facets and hits rather than filtering out facets and results without hits.

member.summary: Gets facets and their available values based on the results of the query.
member.remarks: Will include 0 hit facet values and facets as well, which can be filtered later on if required.

member.summary: Queries and returns facets.
member.returns: Converted facets from RavenDB facets to uCommerce facets.

member.name: M:UCommerce.Search.RavenDB.RavenFacetProvider.MapFacetsFromRavenFacetResult(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,Raven.Abstractions.Data.FacetResult},System.Collections.Generic.IList{UCommerce.Search.Facets.Facet})
member.summary: Converts RavenFacets to uCommerce facets.

member.name: M:UCommerce.Search.RavenDB.RavenFacetProvider.EnsureFacetValuesFor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{UCommerce.Search.Facets.Facet},UCommerce.Search.Facets.Facet)
member.summary: Updates a facet with the real number of hits of each facet value.
member.param: List of facets with Real facet values.
Facet from the unfiltered list of facets.
member.remarks: Raven filters away values with zero hits. So we have to compare the total unfiltered list of facets and values with the queried facets in order to return total list of facets with total list of values even values without any hits.

member.name: T:UCommerce.Tree.Impl.TreeContentService
member.summary:
This is the default implementation of the tree content service, responsible for building the core structure of the uCommerce tree.
When a node type is passed to the service, all the registered content providers that supports the type will be asked to deliver child nodes. The combined nodes are returned in the order the providers are registered.

member.name: M:UCommerce.Runtime.OrderContext.CreateBasket
member.summary: Creates the basket.
member.remarks: Will look up currency in this order: SiteContext.Current.CatalogContext.CurrentCatalog. Then checks whether the current catalog group has just one catalog and uses the currency of that. Finally if no currency is found it will look whether just one currency is configured and use that as a default. If no currency is found using these strategies an exception is thrown.

member.summary: Placeholder used when extracting payment information for an url.

member.name: M:UCommerce.Transactions.Payments.PaymentUrlInformation.ExtractInformation(System.Web.HttpRequest)
member.summary: Extract payment information from the given .
member.remarks: It uses the URL to extract information from, in the following format: example 1.1. /{somedir}/{someotherdir}/{PaymentMethodName}/{PaymentGuid}/file.axd example 1.2. /{somedir}/{someotherdir}/{PaymentMethodName}/{PaymentId}/file.axd example 2.1. /{PaymentMethodName}/{PaymentGuid}/otherfile.axsd example 2.2. /{PaymentMethodName}/{PaymentId}/otherfile.axsd The '/' is used as the spilt character, so the PaymentGuid/PaymentId is the array[Length - 2] and the PaymentMethodName is: array[Length - 3]
member.exception: Ìf the does not contain at least 2 subdirectories.
member.returns: A with the information.

member.summary: Payment id.
member.remarks: Only on of Payment Id or Payment Guid will be set
